title: Admission through KCET
content: According to the pes website we can obtain a seat in pes through KCET by uploading our marks card in the website after paying 1.2k for admission,but will there be seats through KCET counselling as well or is it only through their website

comments.body: Like usual 40% of the seats are reserved for KCET counselling. The rest 60%'s split between JEE Mains, KCET (through PES counselling; this is what you see on the website) and management.
But the fees through KCET counselling and kcet through pes counselling will be the same ?
Through PES its 5 lakhs so cutoff rank will be less other wise its 1.2l thru KEA counselling
